c1.name: Clarity of Heart
c1.descriptionRaw: <color=#FFD780FF>Spring Spirit Summoning</color> can be used 1 more time.
c1.description: Spring Spirit Summoning can be used 1 more time.

c2.name: Centered Spirit
c2.descriptionRaw: <color=#FFD780FF>Divine Maiden's Deliverance</color> lasts for 6 seconds longer. Active characters within the skill's field deal 15% increased <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color> CRIT DMG.
c2.description: Divine Maiden's Deliverance lasts for 6 seconds longer. Active characters within the skill's field deal 15% increased Cryo CRIT DMG.

c3.name: Seclusion
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Spring Spirit Summoning</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Spring Spirit Summoning by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Insight
c4.descriptionRaw:
When characters under the effect of <color=#FFD780FF>Icy Quill</color> applied by Shenhe trigger its DMG Bonus effects, Shenhe will gain a Skyfrost Mantra stack:
路 When Shenhe uses <color=#FFD780FF>Spring Spirit Summoning</color>, she will consume all stacks of Skyfrost Mantra, increasing the DMG of that Spring Spirit Summoning by 5% for each stack consumed.
路 Max 50 stacks. Stacks last for 60s.
c4.description:
When characters under the effect of Icy Quill applied by Shenhe trigger its DMG Bonus effects, Shenhe will gain a Skyfrost Mantra stack:
路 When Shenhe uses Spring Spirit Summoning, she will consume all stacks of Skyfrost Mantra, increasing the DMG of that Spring Spirit Summoning by 5% for each stack consumed.
路 Max 50 stacks. Stacks last for 60s.

c5.name: Divine Attainment
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Divine Maiden's Deliverance</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Divine Maiden's Deliverance by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Mystical Abandon
c6.descriptionRaw: When characters trigger <color=#FFD780FF>Icy Quill</color>'s effects using Normal and Charged Attack DMG, it does not count toward the Trigger Quota.
c6.description: When characters trigger Icy Quill's effects using Normal and Charged Attack DMG, it does not count toward the Trigger Quota.
